visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Weekly Price Trends'. The x-axis should display days of the week with labels styled in blue, size 12px. The y-axis should be logarithmic, with labels formatted to show dollar values and styled in green, size 14px. The chart should include a series named 'Price' with data points [5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 15]. The chart should use custom colors for the series and plot bands, with the series color set to #FF5733 and plot bands in shades of orange and yellow. Additional configurations should include a white background for the chart, a legend positioned at the bottom, and margins set to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Weekly Price Trends'. The x-axis displays days of the week with blue, 12px font-sized labels. The y-axis is logarithmic, showing dollar values with green, 14px font-sized labels. The chart includes a series named 'Price' with data points [5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 15], colored in #FF5733. Plot bands are added to the y-axis to highlight specific price ranges with shades of orange and yellow. The chart has a white background and a legend positioned at the bottom. Margins are set to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left to provide adequate spacing around the chart.
